rev.comment: future events should be always treated as uncertain

== Features ==
== Features ==
â
It will have Baidu applications replacing Google's for many core functions, such as the search engine, instant messenger, ebook reader, and app store.<ref>[http://www.reuters.com/article/2011/09/02/us-baidu-idUSTRE7810OX20110902 Baidu offers glimpse of new mobile OS], [[Reuters]], 2 September 2011</ref> Baidu will provide 180 gigabytes of [[cloud storage]] for users.<ref>{{cite web | url=http://techcrunch.com/2011/09/02/baidu-looks-to-leapfrog-google-with-cloud-based-mobile-os/ | title=Baidu Looks To Leapfrog Google With Cloud-Based Mobile OS (Update) | publisher=TechCrunch | date=2 September 2011 | accessdate=7 September 2011}}</ref>
+
It will have Baidu applications replacing Google's for many core functions, such as the search engine, instant messenger, ebook reader, and app store.<ref>[http://www.reuters.com/article/2011/09/02/us-baidu-idUSTRE7810OX20110902 Baidu offers glimpse of new mobile OS], [[Reuters]], 2 September 2011</ref> Baidu is expected to provide 180 gigabytes of [[cloud storage]] for users.<ref>{{cite web | url=http://techcrunch.com/2011/09/02/baidu-looks-to-leapfrog-google-with-cloud-based-mobile-os/ | title=Baidu Looks To Leapfrog Google With Cloud-Based Mobile OS (Update) | publisher=TechCrunch | date=2 September 2011 | accessdate=7 September 2011}}</ref>
